title: Large Sample Size, Are The Celtics A Contender?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Kevin Arnovitz and Kevin Pelton to talk if the Celtics have a legitimate chance to reach the NBA Finals this year, how concerning the drop-off is for the Bucks’ defensive rating, the struggles of the Lakers down the stretch and when the last time the Western Conference had such little depth.

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Do The Celtics Have A Legitimate Chance To Win The Title?
